title: Payment Gateway Timeout
description: Customers are getting stuck on the spinning loader during checkout.

title: Password Reset Link Not Sending
description: Users reporting they are not receiving the automated recovery email.

title: Search Bar Returns Empty Results
description: Even with exact keyword matches, the search page displays 'No products found'.

title: Mobile App Crash on Android 14
description: App force closes immediately after the splash screen on the latest Android version.

title: Promo Code 'WINTER25' Error
description: System says code is expired, but settings show it should be active.

title: Slow Dashboard Loading
description: The analytics page takes over 12 seconds to load for users.

title: Missing Invoice PDF
description: The 'Download Invoice' button does nothing when clicked in the Billing section.

title: Profile Picture Upload Bug
description: Users getting 'Internal Server Error' when trying to upload .png files.

title: Google Calendar Sync Failure
description: New appointments are not showing up on synced external calendars.

title: Live Chat Widget Missing
description: The support bubble is not appearing on the mobile version of the site.

title: Duplicate Billing Notification
description: Customers are receiving two identical 'Subscription Renewed' emails.

title: API 500 Error on /v1/auth
description: The authentication endpoint is failing sporadically under heavy load.
